1.Physical house verification with a focus on: .House-roof & wall type as per housing criteria .Customer lives in approved area .Lifestyle details as per 'Housing information' section in the CPF(category:Lower middle class,poor,very poor)
2.Verification of KYC documents;CP & Loan Application .Verify correct postal address & pin code is mentioned in the CPF .Verify photo ID proof with original ID .Verify address proof with original proof of the current residence .Verify age proof with original for customer & spouse .Check if permanent address details with pincode is in CPF
3.Purpose of the new loan: .Check if the purpose of the new loan is towards income generation/consumption purpose. .Check if the loan amount applied justifies the said purpose. .Is the customer's spouse/son aware of the loan applied for the said purpose(applicable as per the Branch Credit policy)
4.Verification of occupation & Income: .Does the customer\'s occupation match the loan purpose?(Occupation of spouse/son should match the loan purpose,where applicable) .Check if customer is in an occupation that may affect our relationship. .Does the customer have sufficient repayment capacity to repay the applied loan-refer \'Household cash flow' and 'calculation of surplus' section in the Customer Profile Form? .Does the income and expense information given by the customer match with the details in the Customer Profile Form? .customer Business verification is mandatory for all loans.
5.Group Guarantee: .Has the customer supported her group members in the past year? .Did anybody ask for commission when applying for the loan? .Is the customer agreeble for the proposed group merger .Check for blood relatives in the group .Check if customer understands the insurance claim process.
6.Outside Borrowings: .Verify if the customer borrowings match with the details given in the \'Outside Borrowings\' section of the customer Profile form. .Does the customer understand the impact of the Credit Bureau on her?If she defaults,does she know that she will not get future loans? .Ask if there isover borrowing & ghost lending in her group or centre-reiterate the Sankalp video examples. .Ensure customer has not borrowed from more than one MFI and total borrowing does not exceed Rs 60000 from all sources.
